hsg-desc: Leverages Highslide JS-powered galleries for images and YouTube videos: supports thumbnails or inline anchor text, slideshow grouping via hsgid and MediaWiki-style captions within an interactive overlay.
hsgimg-desc: Parser function {{#hsgimg:}} inserts a Highslide-enabled image (thumbnail or inline anchor text) with optional gallery grouping.
hsgytb-desc: Parser function {{#hsgytb:}} inserts a Highslide-enabled YouTube video (thumbnail or inline anchor text) with optional gallery grouping.
hsg-hover-instructions: Click/drag to move image. Use controls or keyboard arrow keys to navigate, f key to zoom in/out, spacebar to play/pause. Press Esc, or click close/margins to exit.
